title: Mintt – Digital Experience Redefined
description: We designed and developed a modern, user-friendly website for Mintt, a fast-growing financial services company, to clearly showcase its lending solutions and deliver a seamless digital experience. Built with scalability and performance in mind, the platform supports Mintt’s mission to simplify lending through technology.

title: Viking International Moving – Global Relocation, Redefined Online
description: We partnered with Viking International Moving—a leading provider of global relocation and shipping services—to build a high-performing, intuitive website that showcases their full suite of services and reinforces their trusted reputation. The result is a clean, responsive platform designed to deliver a seamless experience for clients around the world.

title: Atlas Auctioneers – Powering Auction Excellence Online
description: We built a dynamic, user-friendly website for Atlas Auctioneers, a leader in business liquidation and auction services, to clearly highlight their offerings and streamline client engagement. The result is a high-performing digital platform that blends functionality, clarity, and professional design—reflecting their reputation for excellence in the industry.

title: Commercial Nextres – Elevating Real Estate & Financial Services Online
description: We developed a modern, user-focused website for Commercial Nextres, a leader in real estate and financial services, to effectively showcase its innovative solutions. The platform combines clean design with robust functionality—delivering a seamless experience that reflects the company’s professionalism and market expertise.

title: Nexys – Loan Origination Software
description: A collaboration between CodeCharley x Nexys, this project involved designing and building a modern digital platform that streamlines the entire loan origination workflow—from application to underwriting. The solution eliminates manual errors, increases productivity, and delivers a seamless experience for private lenders, banks, mortgage professionals, and borrowers.I contributed to creating an intuitive, high-performance interface that helps financial institutions manage loan applications more efficiently and confidently. Nexys empowers lenders with a smarter, automated, and more transparent lending process.

title: eDSCR – Retail Loan Origination Software
description: we partnered with eDSCR to build a modern, high-performance digital platform tailored for the real estate and financial services industry. eDSCR needed a solution that not only highlighted its advanced retail loan origination capabilities but also delivered a smooth, intuitive user experience for its customers.

title: Finresi – Innovative Web Platform for Lending & Financial Services
description: we partnered with Finresi to design and develop a modern, high-impact digital platform tailored for the lending and financial services sector. Finresi needed a website that clearly showcased its powerful solutions while delivering a seamless, intuitive experience for its clients.

title: Lendbright – Modern Web Experience for Financial Services
description: I helped design and develop a sleek, user-friendly website for Lendbright, a fast-growing company in the lending and financial services sector. The goal was to clearly showcase their solutions while delivering a smooth, intuitive digital experience. The result is a modern, high-performance platform built with precision and crafted to support Lendbright’s digital growth.

title: CodeCharley – Web Design & Development
description: At CodeCharley, I help businesses build strong digital first impressions through custom, high-performing websites. Working closely with clients, our team designs and develops modern, visually striking platforms that are optimized for usability, performance, and business results.
